message: Let's get this started! I'll take the lion's share, but I'll give you a decent chunk too. What do you say?
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think it's a fair start. Your turn again!
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. You can't have it all, Alice!
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob! But I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Let's make a deal!
